name: Morgan Pelissier
description: With Airtable, we had to create everything from scratch. Everything was very manual and needed a lot of DIY with custom integrations. It wouldn’t make sense to manage our events in a sales pipe. We’re here to build relationships.

name: Amir Ashkenazi
description: Instead of leaving contacts spread across emails and LinkedIn, folk lets me centralize and segment my contacts the way I want and communicate with my community easily.

name: Elisa Reggiardo
description: It’s so easy for me to keep track and set reminders to follow up with prospective partners, so nothing ever falls through the cracks.

name: Shibin M
description: We used to manage contacts in Google Sheets, and it was a nightmare of duplicates. Before folk, life was hard. Now it’s very easy.

name: Sarah Barron
description: For major communication campaigns, entrepreneurs at eFounders leverage a network of journalists and influencers that we’ve built over the years and constantly update using folk.

name: Benjamin Tincq
description: Every time I find someone interesting—an expert or founder—I add them using folkX with a tag and relevant info, then create a reminder to follow up later.
